row.process: ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred :BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL Add-PSSnapin Microsoft.SharePoint.PowerShell :P lister les sites collections Get-SPSite -Limit ALL | select url :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode

row.pre_process:
! :set &ENVIRONNEMENT# = "PRD" ! :set &HOST_SHAREPOINT_PRIMARY#="SPPRDSHP39" !set attribut host !:PUT_ATT HOST = '&HOST_SHAREPOINT_PRIMARY#'
! :IF &ENVIRONNEMENT# <> "PRD" ! !set attribut login for OS-Agent ! :PUT_ATT LOGIN = 'LOGIN.SHAREPOINT.INSTALL_QAS' ! !:SET &CONN_USER# = GET_ATT(USERID)! ! : else ! :PUT_ATT LOGIN = 'LOGIN.SHAREPOINT.INSTALL_PRD' ! !:SET &CONN_USER# = GET_ATT(USERID)! ! :ENDIF

row.post_process:
! :set &TITRE_SHAREPOINT# = "automic_test1" ! :set &ENVIRONNEMENT# = "DEV" :p VERIFICATION DES SITES COLLECTION
: SET &HND1# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*https://&TITRE_SHAREPOINT#-qas*") : PROCESS &HND1# : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#)
: ENDPROCESS : IF &VALUE# <> "" : P &VALUE# est present : else : P &TITRE_SHAREPOINT#-qas absent : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT = "&TITRE_SHAREPOINT#-qas absent" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = 50 : SET &RC1# = SEND_MAIL("exploitation.windows@cofelyineo-gdfsuez.com", , "ERREUR OA: Sharepoint N0[&REQUEST_NUMBER#]&TITRE_SHAREPOINT# ", "Bonjour, erreur de passage en production de sharepoint &TITRE_SHAREPOINT#: absence du site &TITRE_SHAREPOINT#-qas.", , , )
: ENDIF
